availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Magoffin County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Mary Riley in Morgan County, Kentucky, on October 31, 1849. Father of William Bayes, Margarett J. Bayes, Elijah M. Bayes, Daniel C. Bayes, Samuel E. Bayes, Francis M. Bayes, and Millard F. Bayes. Farmer in Morgan County in 1850. Farmer in Magoffin County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States_ (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Morgan County, p. 161B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Magoffin County, Licking Station, p. 494.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Morgan County Marriages, Film #000839918, p. 115.
Find A Grave, "Joshua Bayes (1803-1865)," Memorial #121999649, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/121999649 (accessed May 15, 2020).
